title.rendered: GEOKC Programs and Ashram’s Gurus Position Forms

content.rendered:
Volunteer Spiritual Master Form - GEOKC Programs and Ashram’s Gurus Position Forms

(Please read and complete the application careful1y in order to be a qualified
candidate of GEOKC)

Contact

Medical information we should be aware of for any emergency including allergies,
special medications, or any other conditions.

Confidential - demographic data for statistical use only

Applicant Current Status

Educational Information

Work Experiences

Below, please describe present and past Spiritual Master Positions, dating back five years. Please account for all periods of unemployment. Even if you have attached a resume, this section must be completed. Please start with current or most recent position: 

Volunteer Experiences

Please start with current or most recent volunteer experience:

References

Please list three professional or work-related references with whom you have
worked in the past: 

Personal Data

Information provided by you in this part WILL NOT automatically disqualify you
from volunteer Spiritual Master Position with GEOKC, but will be considered on
the base of all relevant circumstances.

Authorization & Acknowledgement

I certify that I have made true, correct and complete answers and statements on this application in the knowledge that they may be relied upon in considering my application and volunteer Spiritual Master Position with GEOKC. I also understand that any falsification or misrepresentation made by me on this application, or any supplement to it will be sufficient grounds for failure to work as volunteer Spiritual Master Position or for my discharge immediately with the GEOKC.

Global Expansion of Krishna Community (GEOKC) does not discriminate in hiring on the basis of race, color, religion, national origin, sex, marital status, age, disability, or other protected class status. The information obtained on this application will be used only/solely for purpose which will be according to GEOKC policies and applicable law. GEOKC is an Equal Opportunity Hiring Nonprofit Organization.

Thank You!
